page.title: 08Activities in Kinoulton
page.content: There are several{clubs}in Kinoulton one of which is{Brownies. Brownies meet on Wednesday night from 6.00 to 7.30pm. There are about 28 Brownies. Brownies are girls aged from 7 to 11. When they go to meetings they are dressed in brown dresses with certain badges showing to which group they belong. Brownies are supposed to help others and do a good turn every day. Another club is the{Standard {Sports Club.}This is a club that takes members from 8 to 16 years. They organise trips,camps,games,funruns and keep people in good humour and occupied. There is a{Cricket Club}too. The team plays nearly every week at home or away in the season. When it's not in the season they go to Trent Bridge to play indoor cricket.
